group_1.textRight: Ahh, the world in that app is still running?
Even I, the creator, had completely forgotten...
I knew it, it looks like it was an experiment@that Touka started...

group_1.textLeft: The beta game...
...was actually Touka's experiment all along!?
What sort of experiment was it?

group_1.textRight: Um... When the three of us were still in the hospital,
we wanted to create a fictional world where @everyone could live happily.
That was what Touka suggested.

group_1.textLeft: Something like...a virtual space?

group_1.textRight: Yes, that!

group_1.textLeft: Why would ya suddenly think of that?

group_1.textRight: We couldn't go outside for so long...

group_1.textLeft: Ah...
...My favorite season?

group_1.textRight: Yes!
Tell me what your favorite season is, Ui.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... I haven't given it much thought,@[chara:101502:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101502:cheek_0][chara:101502:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_100][chara:101502:lipSynch_1]but it's probably winter, since there's Christmas.

group_1.textRight: Christmas...? What's so great about something like @that?
Can I ask you for the reason why?

group_1.textLeft: Because everyone looks like they're having fun and getting all excited!

group_1.textRight: I see, that's very much like you, Ui.
Oh... Touka, regarding the virtual game we were @talking about last time,
what do you think of this?
A world where Christmas lasts forever...
A world that is always blanketed in snow and @showered with blessings...
A paradise where kids never grow up, suffer, or die.
What do you think about that kind of virtual world?

group_1.textLeft: ...I see, I feel like that kind of setup can really work!
Equipped with autonomous AI that can evolve @based on real personalities...
Oh, I know!
If the system itself is also designed to evolve autonomously...

group_1.textRight: Touka actually went and made it...

group_1.textLeft: In other words, our AIs are living in that fictional @world,
and she was observing how that world would @evolve?

group_1.textRight: It seems so...
Was it in testin' this entire time?
We started this game before Ui came to Mikazuki @Villa, y'know?

group_1.textLeft: In the beginning, it was full of people,
but the number of players began decreasing due to various reasons.

group_1.textRight: I also got bored of it and quit.

group_1.textLeft: From what happened earlier, it seems that @Touka also completely forgot about it...

group_1.textRight: So durin' all this time, our other selves have been @doin' stuff all on their own?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.
I don't know what's happened since then,
but these AIs are no longer
the same as the people we know.

group_1.textRight: Weren't our personalities copied
when we first started the game?

group_1.textLeft: That's right, they originally had our personalities @and memories,
but it seems unnecessary memories were deleted @to adapt them for the game.

group_1.textRight: On top of that, it's been a pretty long time since @then...
And it seems time flows faster inside the game..

group_1.textLeft: That's right, they've become completely different people after all this time!

group_1.textRight: So that's why the other me is dressed like that...
The real me ain't gonna get excited over somethin' @like Christmas.

group_1.textLeft: Well, isn't it interesting? Since when did our other selves
start traveling around on a magical, reindeer motorbike?

group_1.textRight: When we were watching on Tsuruno's phone,
it seemed the two of them stop by towns to @collect fuel,
while heading for the End of the World.

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm gonna check what's happenin' on my phone.
...Hm? Huh, was there supposed to be this sorta @menu?
Which one?

group_1.textRight: Press here! Ya can choose the next destination for @the characters!

group_1.textLeft: You're right!

group_1.textRight: Wasn't this a game where you could only watch?

group_1.textLeft: It looks like we have some control now.
The button was always there, but it couldn't be @pressed!

group_1.textRight: Then for the next destination... @Wanna try choosin' one?

group_1.textLeft: Yep.

group_1.textRight: This is kinda fun!
